articles.author: Raf Sanchez, Chantal Da Silva
articles.title: Israeli military recovers bodies of 3 more hostages from Gaza - NBC News
articles.description: TEL AVIV, Israel — The bodies of three more hostages who were killed in Hamas' Oct. 7 attacks were recovered from the Gaza Strip, the Israeli military said Friday, as the CIA chief headed to Europe in a bid to revive cease-fire talks and as the top United Nat…
